title: Chinese special fried rice
ingredients: ['280g uncooked white rice (or leftover cooked rice)', '3 tablespoons sesame oil', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '130g small prawns', '50g diced ham', '140g leftover cooked chicken, chopped', '2 celery sticks, sliced', '2 carrots, peeled and diced', '1 fresh green pepper, chopped', '75g peas', '1 egg, beaten', '4 tablespoons soy sauce']
